snippet: Senator James Inhofe canceled a meeting with President Obama's nominee for ambassador to Iraq after leaked e-mails surfaced suggesting the nominee had an affair with a Wall Street Journal reporter.
abstract: Senator James Inhofe canceled a meeting with President Obama's nominee for ambassador to Iraq after leaked e-mails surfaced suggesting the nominee had an affair with a Wall Street Journal reporter.

headline.main: Senator Raises Questions About Nominee for Iraq Ambassador
headline.print_headline: Senator Raises Questions About Envoy Nominee
